text: 6:10 Godɨn Araziba 32:43; Onger Akaba 78:10; Akar Mogomem 11:18; 16:7; 19:2Duar kaba dɨa kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gavgaviba bar itir Ekiam, nɨ arazir kuraba bar dar saghon ikia egha bar zue! Ezɨ nɨn akar dɨkɨrɨziba da guizbangɨra otifi! E nɨ mɨzua iti, nɨ zuamɨra nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibar araziba tuisɨghɨva, egh en ghuzimɨn ivezim ikarvagh!”
